room_title: Escape room "Shadow Manor" by Memphis Escape Rooms in Memphis
room_description:
It's a dark and stormy night. Feeling mischievous, you and your friends decide to take a stroll to the abandoned house at the end of the street for a good-natured scare. But your evening of fun turns into a real-life nightmare when the door slams behind you and you find yourself locked inside Shadow Manor.
As the story goes, the mysterious woman that used to live there died from heartbreak and has haunted the house ever since. Now she's holding you hostage until you help her put the pieces of her life back together. Will you escape to tell the tale, or become another one of the ghost stories that haunt Shadow Manor?
